name: Loom Knitting Primer: A Beginner's Guide to Knitting on a Loom, With 30 Fun Projects

reviews.name: Loom Knitting Primer: A Beginner's Guide to Knitting on a Loom, With 30 Fun Projects
reviews.reviewText: This book is great for beginners, but it is also good for those with experience knitting on a loom. It goes beyond just the basics and includes instructions on how to do many decorative stiches such as cable, mock cable, double knit, rib knit, and others, all without needles. It shows you how to knit scarves, hats, socks, sweaters, and includes how to felt knitted objects. This is the book I've been looking for since I got my loom. I highly recommend this book to anyone interested in expanding on their knowledge of loom knitting.
reviews.title: This is a helpful book

reviews.name: Loom Knitting Primer: A Beginner's Guide to Knitting on a Loom, With 30 Fun Projects
reviews.reviewText: I have never knitted before; this is an easy way to start.
reviews.title: loom knitter

reviews.name: Loom Knitting Primer: A Beginner's Guide to Knitting on a Loom, With 30 Fun Projects
reviews.reviewText: This is a must for anyone to needs help with the knitting looms, whether round or long.
reviews.title: GREAT BOOK

reviews.name: Loom Knitting Primer: A Beginner's Guide to Knitting on a Loom, With 30 Fun Projects
reviews.reviewText: This book is so easy to understand and fun to read through. The instructions and pictures are clear and helpful. It answered several questions about starting to weave.
reviews.title: What fun!
